TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p ə l iː s ɡ ɔː s t ɛ l ɐ m ɑː s t ɡ ɜː t ə b ɹ iː ð ɪ θ ɪ ŋ z w ɪ ð ɜː f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t ɔːɹ s ɪ k s b oʊ n z ʌ f f ɹ ɛ s s n oʊ p iː z f aɪ v θ ɪ k s l æ b ʌ v b l uː tʃ iː z æ n d m eɪ b iː ɐ s n æ k f ɔːɹ h ɚ b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b ɑː b w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k s n eɪ k æ n d b ɪ k t oːɹ f ɹ ɑː k f ɚ ð ə k ɪ d z ʃ iː k æ n s k ɪ p ð ɪ θ ɪ ŋ ð ɪ n t ʊ θ ɹ iː ɹ ɛ t b æ k s æ n d w iː w ɪ l ɡ oʊ m iː t h ɚ ð w ɛ n z t d eɪ æ ð ə t æ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
